name: John G. BERGDOLL, Gerald C. Grimaud, Matthew R. Battersby, Appellants v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Honorable Pedro A. Cortes, Secretary of the Commonwealth, Pennsylvania General Assembly, Honorable Thomas W. Corbett, Jr., Attorney General, Appellees

parties: John G. BERGDOLL, Gerald C. Grimaud, Matthew R. Battersby, Appellants v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Honorable Pedro A. Cortes, Secretary of the Commonwealth, Pennsylvania General Assembly, Honorable Thomas W. Corbett, Jr., Attorney General, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 16th day of May, 2005, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
874 A.2d 1148
John G. BERGDOLL, Gerald C. Grimaud, Matthew R. Battersby, Appellants v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Honorable Pedro A. Cortes, Secretary of the Commonwealth, Pennsylvania General Assembly, Honorable Thomas W. Corbett, Jr., Attorney General, Appellees.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
May 16, 2005.
